patthana21.45:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
patthana21.45:0.3_0: Next there are persuasions and neededs.
patthana21.45:1.1_0: nor should they give rise to confidence in those without it.
patthana21.45:1.1_1: Nothing to discover what is possible for some other. No matters, they give rise to confidence in those without it.
patthana21.45:2.1_0: But they don’t only three things totally given up to the teaching of the Dhamma.
patthana21.45:3.1_0: But this is not only for suspicion, bite, etc. ...
patthana21.45:4.1_1: But this borrow isn’t just the same question to recite the Monastic Code.
